Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, traveling north and south.
Room.LongDescription: Darby Reynold's famous shipyard is located east of Oceanview Drive. This location has been the center of the ship-building industry ever since ships were introduced to Oceancrest. To the west is the South Nylandian Bay Guard Station, where marines and other city guards constantly patrol the open seas for pirates and other hooligans unworthy of freedom.
